hero_description: Sign up in a few steps or log in to explore opportunities and post jobs.
about_desc: More agility to find compatible jobs, highlight your soft skills and position yourself in the market safely.
about_card1_text: Show your experiences, skills and interests in detail.
about_card4_text: Connects candidates and companies to the ideal vacancies.
clients_desc: Companies that believe in our technology and grow with more human, fast and intelligent hiring solutions.
cta_desc: Sign up or log in and take the next step.
contact_whatsapp_desc: Ask questions or talk to support.
footer_desc: Connect Skills is a recruitment platform focused on connecting candidates with the best vacancies, using artificial intelligence to highlight the behavioral skills of candidates.
forgot_password_instruction: Enter your email to receive a recovery code.
verify_email_desc_reset: We sent a code to {{email}}. Enter it below to reset your password.
recovery_code_sent_if_exists: If the email is registered, you will receive a recovery code.
error_sending_email: Error sending email. Try again later.
code_expired_new: Code expired. Request a new one.
confirm_leave_page: Are you sure you want to leave? Your unsaved data will be lost.
register_terms_label: I have read and accept the <0>Terms of Use</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1> of Connect Skills.
register_error_terms_required: Acceptance of Terms of Use is required.
register_verify_desc: We sent a code to {{email}}. Enter it below to activate your account.
error_sending_code: Error sending code. Please try again.
vacancy_applied_desc: Your assessment has been sent and is under review.
video_upload_rejected_desc: The company has already sent feedback on your application. Video upload is no longer available.
video_upload_expired_desc: The 1-week deadline for video submission has expired. Therefore, it is not possible to submit your presentation video.
video_upload_requested_desc: The company has requested a presentation video of up to 3 minutes.
video_upload_sending: Uploading video... (this may take a few seconds)
video_upload_success_expired: Video expired (available for 1 week after submission)
video_replace_desc: You can replace your video before the company evaluates it.
video_viewed_desc: The company has already viewed your video. It is no longer possible to change it.
video_removed_after_evaluation: The video was submitted but is no longer available (removed after company evaluation).
video_expired_desc_company: The video file has been removed after the expiration period, but the full AI analysis has been preserved for your reference.
video_error_size: The video must be at most 100MB
video_error_duration: The video must be at most 3 minutes
video_error_format: Invalid video format or error loading
video_instruction_quiet: Record in a quiet, closed place. Noise can prevent analysis.
video_instruction_noise_warning: Videos with too much noise are not understood by the system and may result in the loss of the vacancy.
video_instruction_duration: You have up to 3 minutes. Speak without interruptions.
video_instruction_visibility: The analyzed video will be seen by the hiring company and HR.
camera_access_error: Could not access camera and microphone. Check your permissions.
video_confirm_modal_desc: Check your video below. If everything is correct, click "Send Video" to finish.
video_confirm_modal_warning: * Attention: After sending, it will not be possible to change the video.
modal_apply_desc_prefix: You are about to apply for the position of
modal_apply_rule_1: A new tab will be opened for the test.
modal_apply_rule_2: Do not leave the tab during the test.
modal_apply_rule_3: The use of Control+C and Control+V is disabled.
modal_apply_rule_4: Your response time will be counted.
modal_apply_rule_5: If you leave the screen, the questions will be changed.
modal_apply_start_now: Do you want to start the interview now?
logout_modal_desc: Are you sure you want to end your session?
dashboard_video_evaluation_desc: The candidate has submitted the requested video. Rate it now!
dashboard_subtitle: Track your applications, view recommended jobs, and advance your professional journey.
dashboard_video_request_desc: The company has requested a presentation video.
dashboard_hero_desc: What do you want to do today?
dashboard_recommended_desc: Jobs that match your areas of interest.
dashboard_history_desc: Check the jobs you have already applied for.
dashboard_history_empty: You haven't applied for any jobs yet.
dashboard_profile_cta: Complete your profile to increase your chances!
dashboard_hero_desc_panel: Welcome to your Connect Skills dashboard.
dashboard_hero_desc_panel_company: Welcome to your Connect Skills dashboard.
no_vacancies_desc: You haven't published any jobs yet. Start hiring now by publishing your first opportunity.
no_candidates_desc: No candidates have applied for your jobs recently.
company_dashboard_subtitle: Manage your jobs, track candidates and find talent aligned with your company's needs.
dashboard_profile_company_hint: * Personalize your company's visual details to attract more talent.
dashboard_profile_completion_cta: Complete your profile for better recommendations
dashboard_profile_hint: * Companies prefer profiles with complete information.
dashboard_history_empty_recom: We don't have recommendations yet. Complete your profile and select areas to improve suggestions.
vacancies_subtitle: Explore opportunities that match your profile.
history_empty_desc: View all the jobs you have already applied for.
favorites_empty_desc: The jobs you saved to view later.
all_vacancies_desc: View all jobs based on your search.
recommended_vacancies_desc: View the best jobs based on your specialties.
select_areas_to_find: Select at least one new area of interest to find jobs.
no_applications_found_search: No applications found for your search.
no_applications_yet: You haven't applied for any jobs yet.
no_favorites_found_search: No favorite jobs found for your search.
no_favorites_yet: You haven't favorited any jobs yet.
no_vacancies_found_search: No jobs found for your search.
no_recommended_vacancies: No recommended jobs at the moment.
want_to_search_global: I want to search for new jobs
global_search_hint: By searching here, we will remove the 'Areas of Interest' filter to show absolutely all jobs compatible with your search.
my_vacancies_subtitle: Manage your opportunities and view applications.
bulk_delete_desc: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {{count}} jobs? This action cannot be undone.
bulk_lock_desc: Do you want to lock the {{count}} selected jobs? They will no longer appear in public search.
bulk_unlock_desc: Do you want to reopen the {{count}} selected jobs for new applications?
lock_vacancy_desc: Are you sure you want to lock the job {{cargo}}? New candidates will not be able to apply.
unlock_vacancy_desc: Do you want to reopen the job {{cargo}} for new applications?
my_profile_subtitle: Your information, skills, and professional goals.
edit_profile_max_links_alert: You can add a maximum of 5 links.
edit_profile_description_placeholder: Tell us a bit about yourself...
edit_profile_description_tip: Tip: focus on your main experiences
delete_account_modal_desc: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and all your data will be lost.
use_profile_location: Use location defined in my profile
vacancy_description_placeholder: Describe responsibilities, mandatory and desirable requirements...
inclusion_diversity_desc: Check the options below if this is an affirmative or exclusive vacancy for specific groups.
ideal_candidate_placeholder: Ex: The ideal candidate for this position should have prior experience in car sales...
ideal_candidate_hint: * This text will be appended to the job description upon saving.
validation_soft_skills_required: Select at least one soft skill.
ai_error_generating: Error generating content with AI. Try again.
vacancy_published_desc: Your vacancy is now live and candidates can apply.
vacancy_updated_desc: The vacancy information has been successfully updated.
publish_vacancy_subtitle: Fill in the details below to publish a new opportunity.
edit_vacancy_subtitle: Update the details of your opportunity.
ai_assistant_description: Briefly describe the job and let our AI suggest the title, full description, questions, and ideal skills for the position.
ai_generating_btn: Generating (This may take up to 1 minute)
ranking_subtitle: Candidates are ranked based on compatibility (0–100) calculated by our AI from their answers. Ties are broken by application time.
ranking_no_candidates: No candidates have applied for this vacancy yet.
ranking_no_selection_desc: Please select a vacancy from the dashboard to view the ranking.
ranking_pending_mode_desc: You must evaluate all pending candidates to restore full access to the platform.
answers_modal_no_responses: No responses available for this candidate.
analysis_modal_not_available: Analysis not available for this candidate.
application_details_no_suggestions: No suggestions available at the moment.
candidates_page_subtitle: Candidates ordered by vacancy affinity via AI analysis.
candidates_page_no_candidates: No candidates have applied for this vacancy yet.
candidates_page_access_denied_desc: Only companies can view this page.
candidates_page_access_denied_desc_2: You do not have permission to view candidates for this vacancy.
edit_no_selection_desc: Please select a vacancy from the dashboard to edit.
edit_not_found_desc: The vacancy you are trying to edit does not exist or has been removed.
max_links_alert: You can add a maximum of 5 links.
company_description_placeholder: Describe your company, mission, values and culture...
company_description_hint: Tip: focus on the company's mission and values
email_notifications_desc: Receive emails about new applications and submitted videos.
company_profile_desc: Information about your company and contact details.
feedback_min_length_error: The justification must be at least 40 characters long.
company_desc_placeholder: Describe the company, citing its services and products.
areas_subtitle: Select skills to add to your profile.
modal_add_skill_desc: Enter the name of the skill you want to add.
error_saving_areas: An error occurred while saving your specialties. Please try again.
user_not_identified: User not identified. Please log in again.
modal_add_skill_custom_desc: Add a custom skill that is not on the list.
Dominância: Dominance
Influência: Influence
Estabilidade: Stability
Conformidade: Compliance
application_status_rejected_desc: The company reviewed your profile and decided not to proceed with your application.
application_status_not_listed_desc: The company has chosen not to proceed with your application at this time.
application_status_approved_desc: Congratulations! The company liked your profile and approved you for the next step.

Dominância: Do you prioritize the fastest solution even if it involves calculated risks?
In intellectual debates, is your focus on winning the argument or finding the truth?
Do you feel comfortable making cognitive decisions with only 60% of the information?
How do you react when an innovation process takes longer than planned?
Do you prefer leading the brainstorming or executing the generated ideas?
Do you tend to discard ideas that show no immediate practical applicability?
When solving problems, do you focus more on the final impact than the process?
Are you stimulated by complex problems that others have given up solving?
Do you prefer deciding the path forward alone or together?
Do you usually interrupt slow reasoning to get straight to the conclusion?
Is your creativity aimed at beating the competition or self-expression?
Do you handle the pressure of delivering innovative solutions within short deadlines well?
Do you prefer being the 'architect' of the idea or the 'executor' of it?
What is your reaction when a logical analysis contradicts your market intuition?
Do you consider yourself more pragmatic than theoretical in your reflections?
Do you usually challenge conventional thinking to accelerate results?
Is failure in an innovation attempt acceptable to you if it happens fast?
Do you focus on solutions that bring large-scale returns?
Do you prefer simplifying complex problems to act quickly?
Does cognitive uncertainty paralyze you or propel you to act?
Influência: Do you use metaphors and stories to explain complex concepts?
Is your creativity stimulated by group work or isolated reflection?
When presenting a new idea, do you focus more on visual impact or content?
Do you usually enthuse others about a vision even before validating it?
How important is public recognition for your innovation capability?
Do you prefer debating ideas in a relaxed or formal environment?
Do you seek inspiration in informal conversations with people from different areas?
Do you feel frustrated if your innovative idea is not celebrated by the team?
How do you react when someone criticizes your idea purely technically?
Do you like being seen as the 'visionary' of the group?
Does your cognitive flexibility increase when surrounded by people?
Do you tend to embellish a problem's solution to make it more attractive?
Do you prefer ideation processes involving post-its, drawings, and colors?
Are you motivated by problems involving human behavior?
Do you usually convince others that their solution is similar to yours?
Does lack of social interaction decrease your creative capacity?
Do you like sharing unfinished insights to receive social feedback?
Do you prioritize 'selling' the solution as much as solving the problem?
How do you use your network to gather new perspectives?
Do you consider yourself someone who thinks 'outside the box' to impress?
Estabilidade: Do you prefer improving an existing solution or creating something from scratch?
What is your level of discomfort when changing work methods that already work?
Do you seek consensus before implementing a change in team thinking?
How do you deal with frequent interruptions during tasks requiring analytical focus?
Do you document your findings so others can follow them easily?
Do you prefer a constant learning pace instead of pressure peaks?
Do you feel safer with step-by-step problem-solving methods?
How much time do you need to process a sudden logic change?
Do you prefer listening to all opinions before issuing your technical judgment?
Is your cognitive flexibility greater when you feel in a safe environment?
Do you value the technical tradition of an area when proposing innovations?
How do you react to aggressive criticism of your way of thinking?
Do you prefer working on a single complex problem at a time?
Do you seek to validate your ideas with trusted colleagues before exposing them?
Is process stability more important than innovation speed?
Do you consider yourself a cautious and thoughtful thinker?
Do you usually keep calm when an analytical solution fails?
Do you prefer learning new cognitive skills in a structured way?
Do you feel bad when your cognitive decisions affect team well-being?
Is persistence your main tool for solving difficult problems?
Conformidade: Do you review your calculations and logic more than twice to avoid errors?
How important is following a rigorous scientific method in problem solving?
Do you prefer working with quantitative data or qualitative impressions?
How do you react when someone ignores concrete facts in a discussion?
Do you feel safe acting without a manual or clear guideline?
Is your logical analysis based on historical evidence or future projections?
Do you consider yourself a rigorous critic of others' ideas and your own?
What level of detail is necessary for you to consider a problem solved?
Do you prefer technical perfection over quick delivery?
Do you use spreadsheets and mathematical models to support your thinking?
How do you deal with ambiguity or contradictory information?
Do you seek the logical flaw in an argument before accepting it as truth?
Is compliance with quality standards your priority in innovation?
Do you prefer working independently on high-complexity tasks?
Do you document every step of your reasoning for future audits?
How do you react when a brainstorming process seems disorganized?
Are you motivated by tasks requiring high precision and detail?
Do you prefer reading extensive manuals before testing new technology?
Is your creativity limited by rules or do you create within rules?
Do you evaluate an idea's risk based on statistics and probabilities?

Dominância: Do you tend to assume emotional control in conflict situations?
Do you prefer resolving emotional tensions quickly, even without deep dialogue?
Do you get annoyed when emotions delay important decisions?
Do you usually directly confront feelings you consider unproductive?
Do you believe emotional control is a sign of strength?
Do you react firmly when someone shows excessive fragility?
Do you prefer immediate action to long emotional conversations?
Do you feel the need to impose clear emotional boundaries on others?
Do you handle emotional pressure better than most people?
Do you usually lead emotionally in moments of crisis?
Do you view emotions as something to be managed, not explored?
Do you avoid showing emotional vulnerability?
Do you react with impatience to emotional indecision?
Do you feel responsible for stabilizing the emotional environment?
Do you prefer emotionally objective environments?
Do you tend to minimize emotional impacts to move forward?
Do you feel energized in direct emotional conflicts?
Do you believe emotions should not interfere with results?
Do you usually make emotional decisions alone?
Do you feel you have high emotional resistance?
Influência: Do you express emotions easily in a group?
Do you use emotions to connect people?
Do you feel motivated when sharing feelings?
Do you usually liven up emotionally charged environments?
Do you feel energized by intense emotional exchanges?
Do you demonstrate empathy verbally?
Do you quickly perceive the group's emotional climate?
Do you use enthusiasm to relieve tension?
Do you feel uncomfortable in emotionally cold environments?
Do you usually validate feelings before solving problems?
Do you express yourself emotionally spontaneously?
Do you use humor to deal with difficult emotions?
Do you get frustrated when you can't share what you feel?
Do you influence others' emotions easily?
Do you feel recognized when you emotionally welcome someone?
Do you value emotional connections above technical solutions?
Do you like emotionally expressive environments?
Do you tend to dramatize emotions to generate impact?
Do you feel the need to be understood emotionally?
Do you believe emotions strengthen relationships?
Estabilidade: Do you prefer emotionally predictable environments?
Do you deal with emotions calmly and gradually?
Do you avoid direct emotional confrontations?
Do you prefer listening before reacting emotionally?
Do you maintain emotional stability even under pressure?
Do you adapt emotionally to slow changes?
Do you prefer resolving emotions with continuous dialogue?
Do you avoid intense emotional expressions?
Do you seek emotional security in relationships?
Do you feel uncomfortable with emotional outbursts?
Do you prefer supporting silently?
Do you need time to process emotions?
Do you value emotional constancy?
Do you react serenely to conflicts?
Do you avoid impulsive emotional decisions?
Do you feel responsible for maintaining emotional balance?
Do you prefer stable emotional relationships?
Do you avoid sudden emotional changes?
Do you feel comfortable in emotional routines?
Do you demonstrate empathy discreetly?
Conformidade: Do you analyze emotions rationally?
Do you control emotional expression in the professional environment?
Do you prefer understanding emotions before reacting?
Do you avoid decisions based solely on feeling?
Do you question the emotional validity of certain reactions?
Do you document emotional impacts in processes?
Do you prefer emotionally neutral environments?
Do you separate emotions from responsibilities?
Do you seek emotional balance through logic?
Do you feel uncomfortable with excessive emotionalism?
Do you prefer structured emotional conversations?
Do you measure emotional impacts before acting?
Do you value emotional self-control?
Do you analyze emotional causes carefully?
Do you prefer objective emotional feedback?
Do you avoid emotional involvement in technical decisions?
Do you feel safer with clear emotional boundaries?
Do you observe emotional patterns in others' behavior?
Do you maintain a professional emotional posture?
Do you believe emotions should be regulated?

Dominância: Is your communication direct to the point, even if it seems harsh?
Do you usually interrupt people to speed up the conversation's conclusion?
In meetings, do you focus more on dictating the pace than listening?
Do you prefer talking about results rather than processes?
Do you use a firm tone of voice to ensure your authority is respected?
How do you react to long presentations full of details?
Do you prefer resolving communication conflicts with an immediate confrontation?
Do you send short, objective emails instead of explanatory texts?
Do you feel comfortable giving clear orders without beating around the bush?
Do you prioritize goal clarity in your assertive communication?
Do you usually publicly challenge ideas you consider inefficient?
How fast do you lose patience with vague communications?
Do you prefer quick calls to endless message exchanges?
Do you use assertive gestures and intense eye contact when forming?
Do you feel good being the spokesperson for difficult news?
Do you focus your speech on 'what' must be done rather than 'how'?
Do you usually take the floor in groups that lack direction?
Do you evaluate a conversation's success by the speed of the decision made?
Are you honest even if the truth hurts the listener?
Do you prefer commanding a meeting's agenda?
Influência: Do you use charisma and humor to break the ice in conversations?
Do you prefer talking about people and connections rather than technical data?
Is your communication gestural and expressive?
Do you usually tell stories (storytelling) to engage your audience?
How important is it to you that people like your way of speaking?
Do you prefer informal and relaxed meetings?
Do you have ease in persuading others through emotion?
Do you usually praise people before making a criticism?
Do you feel motivated when receiving applause or verbal validation?
Do you prefer verbal communications to written communications?
Do you usually change your tone of voice to maintain listener interest?
Do you seek to be the center of attention in group discussions?
Do you struggle to maintain objectivity in emotional conversations?
How do you use your communication to motivate a discouraged team?
Do you usually promise results enthusiastically?
Are you the person who makes social connections at a corporate event?
Do you prefer public recognition feedback?
Do you use intense adjectives to describe your projects?
Do you seek to create a friendly atmosphere through your speech?
Do you feel frustrated if you don't have space to express your opinion?
Estabilidade: Do you prefer listening patiently before giving your opinion?
Is your communication soft and seeks to avoid any type of friction?
Do you prefer individual conversations to public speaking?
Do you usually ask for everyone's opinion before concluding your speech?
Do you prefer writing what you think to ensure it wasn't aggressive?
How do you react to people who speak very loudly or authoritatively?
Do you value silence and pauses during a conversation?
Do you usually use phrases like 'I feel that' or 'maybe we can'?
Do you prefer predictable communications with prior notice?
Are you the mediator who calms tempers in tense communications?
Do you focus on maintaining group harmony through your words?
Do you struggle to say 'no' directly?
Do you prefer work instructions to be given gently?
Do you usually keep your frustrations to avoid generating conflict?
Do you value consistency and sincerity in others' speech?
Do you prefer hearing about the 'step-by-step' of a task?
Do you seek to create an environment of psychological safety when speaking?
Do you prefer private and constructive feedback?
Do you take longer to respond to ensure your speech is fair?
Do you feel uncomfortable interrupting someone?
Conformidade: Do you prefer written and documented communications for security?
Is your speech based purely on facts, data, and evidence?
Do you avoid gesturing much and maintain a neutral tone of voice?
Do you usually correct technical inaccuracies in others' speech?
Do you prefer presentations with detailed graphs and metrics?
Do you focus your communication on the 'how' and logical processes?
Do you send detailed agendas before any meeting?
How do you react to excessively emotional or vague communications?
Do you prefer silence to saying something you are not absolutely sure about?
Do you use technical and precise terms in your daily language?
Do you feel safer with feedback based on indicators?
Do you tend to be formal and professional in all interactions?
Do you question the information source before accepting the argument?
Do you prefer orders to be given in writing and with norms?
Are you the person who points out risks and flaws in a communicated plan?
Do you avoid informal conversations that don't have a productive goal?
Is your assertive communication based on technical truth?
Do you usually structure your speech in topics and lists?
Do you feel frustrated with meetings that don't follow the agenda?
Do you document all important decisions after a conversation?

Dominância: Does your leadership focus on fast result delivery above all else?

Do you replace team members quickly if they don't perform?
Is your inspiring leadership based on the vision of victory and conquest?

Is your inspiring leadership based on mutual trust and loyalty?

Do you reward silent collaboration and constant effort?
Do you protect your team from excessive external pressures?
Is your decision-making slow to ensure no one is harmed?
Do you prefer leading stable teams with low turnover?
How do you deal with direct conflicts between your followers?
Do you lead by example of patience and perseverance?
Do you prefer horizontal and democratic leadership environments?
Do you focus on maintaining traditions and team culture values?
Do you give soft feedbacks focused on human growth?
Do you feel responsible for the team's physical and mental well-being?
Do you prefer planning leadership changes months in advance?
Do you lead through active listening and empathy?
Do you feel uncomfortable giving harsh orders?
Is your goal as a leader to create a team that feels like a family?
Conformidade: Does your leadership focus on technical precision and delivery quality?
Do you lead through processes, norms, and clear manuals?
Is your decision-making strictly based on data and metrics?
Do you prefer leading impartially and purely professionally?
Do you reward rigorous compliance with deadlines and standards?
How do you react to followers who are disorganized or too creative?
Is your inspiring leadership based on the search for excellence and truth?
Do you prefer delegating with detailed written instructions?
Do you monitor team progress through reports and KPIs?
How do you deal with technical errors committed by your team?
Do you prefer leading in regulated environments with clear hierarchy?
Does your authority as a leader come from your deep technical knowledge?
Do you focus on reducing risks and uncertainties for the team?
Are you the leader who reviews final work before delivery?
Do you prefer giving objective and evidence-based feedbacks?
Do you maintain professional distance to not compromise evaluation?
Does your leadership focus on 'how' things must be done correctly?
Do you feel frustrated with lack of logic in company decisions?
Do you organize team structure logically and functionally?
Is your goal to be the most competent and ethical leader of the organization?

Do you tend to accelerate operational decisions?
Do you feel unproductive when you need to wait?
Do you value speed above perfection?

assessment_rule_1_desc: Do not leave this tab or minimize the browser. If you do, your questions will be regenerated.
assessment_rule_2_desc: Copy and paste commands are disabled to ensure response originality.
assessment_rule_3_desc: Your answers will be analyzed by our AI to assess your soft skills.
assessment_timer_hint: Clicking start will begin the timer
assessment_alert_answer_all: Please answer all {{count}} questions before submitting.
assessment_error_generic: Error submitting application. Please try again.
assessment_warning_box: Do not leave this window, switch tabs, or use copy/paste commands. Leaving this screen will result in an immediate reset of your questions.
assessment_success_desc: Your interview has been successfully completed. Our recruiters and AI will analyze your profile and contact you soon.
assessment_penalty_desc: We detected that you left the tab or minimized the browser. To maintain process integrity, your questions have been changed and progress reset.
assessment_confirm_desc: Have you reviewed all your answers? After submission, you cannot change your information for this application.
vacancy_interested_desc: Apply now and join the {{company}} team!
candidate_age_error_under_16: You must be at least 16 years old to register.
parental_consent_desc: As you are under 18 years old, consent from your legal guardian is required to use the platform.
parental_consent_label: I declare that I have authorization from my legal guardian to use this platform and agree to the <0>Terms of Use</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>.
parental_consent_required_error: Legal guardian consent confirmation is required.
candidate_age_error_too_old: Unlikely age. Check your date of birth.
modal_video_request_desc: By confirming, the candidate will receive an email with instructions to record or upload a video of up to 3 minutes. This will help you better evaluate the candidate's communication and profile.
feedback_modal_next_steps_desc: The company will contact you soon to continue the selection process. Keep an eye on your email!
feedback_modal_keep_trying_desc: Use this feedback to improve your next applications. There are many other opportunities waiting for you!
feedback_justification_placeholder: Write a message to the candidate...

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.empty_description: You have no new notifications at the moment.

video_request.title: Introduction Video Requested
video_request.message: The company requested an introduction video of up to 3 minutes.

feedback_rejected.title: Not Selected
feedback_rejected.default_message: The company has chosen not to proceed with your application at this time.

company_notifications.video_expired_unsubmitted_message: {{candidateName}} did not submit the video within the deadline.

pendingEvaluation.title: You have pending candidate evaluations
pendingEvaluation.subtitle: Functionalities are disabled until you evaluate them

warning.title: Action Required
warning.description: We detected candidate videos that expired without evaluation. To maintain service quality and respect candidates' time, all platform features have been temporarily disabled. Access will be restored once you evaluate all pending videos.

instructions.title: How to Restore Access
instructions.step1: Click 'Evaluate Now' on each pending video
instructions.step2: Watch the video and provide honest feedback to the candidate
instructions.step3: After evaluating all videos, access will be automatically restored

feedback_approved_intro:
Hello! Below is your feedback:

You seem to fit the job profile. We found your profile interesting and, therefore, you are approved for the next stage of the selection process.
feedback_approved_closing: Stay tuned for the start of the next stage. Good luck!
feedback_rejected_intro:
Hello! Below is your feedback:

We appreciate your interest in joining our team and the time dedicated to the selection process. However, unfortunately you were not selected for the next stage of the selection process.
feedback_rejected_closing: We wish you success in your professional journey and hope that new opportunities will arise in the future.
